Of course, I'd be happy to recommend some movies based on your preferences! If you enjoy slapstick comedy and don't mind a bit of absurdity, then "Mr. Bean's Holiday" is definitely worth checking out. The film follows the titular character as he embarks on a series of misadventures in France while trying to reunite a young boy with his father. It's a hilarious and lighthearted movie that features Steve Pemberton's iconic performance as Mr. Bean.

Alternatively, if you're in the mood for some action-packed fun, then "The Expendables 2" might be more up your alley. This movie brings together a star-studded cast of action heroes, including Sylvester Stallone, Jason Statham, and Jet Li, as they take on a dangerous mission to revenge the death of one of their own. With plenty of high-octane action sequences and witty banter, "The Expendables 2" is a thrilling ride from start to finish.
